query:
介绍一下Ling Mou Zhineng这家中国Xuhui的公司产品。
他主要做Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Machine Learning, Retail方面的业务方面。
我需要他进一步的产品介绍，功能介绍，官网链接，服务的客户
answer: 零眸智能（Ling Mou Zhineng）是一家总部位于上海徐汇区的AI创业公司，专注于将人工智能、AIOT 与大数据技术深度融合到零售场景中，为线下零售提供全链路的智能化解决方案。其产品与服务主要分为三大类：① 基于核心算法的软­件服务，包括零售稽查、陈列合规、门店资源优化、运营策略制定等 AI 视觉分析与大数据洞察功能，能够实现商品上架、货架摆放、SKU 库存量、促销规则等关键指标的实时检测与自动化报告；② 智能物联网硬件设备，如店内摄像头、边缘计算盒子等，用于采集高分辨率视频并在本地进行机器视觉推理，确保数据安全与低延迟；③ 基于大数据的一体化执行服务，提供从数据采集、清洗、建模到业务执行的全流程支撑，帮助零售企业实现线上线下全域数字化、成本降本增效。公司已为多家国内外连锁零售品牌提供数字化营销与门店监控服务，帮助客户提升销售额、降低人力成本并实现精准运营。官方主页为 https://www.lingmouai.com/（中文名“零眸智能”），联系邮箱 info@retaileye.ai，客服电话 021‑33680282。

results.title: Xuhui-based AI company unveils groundbreaking products
results.content:
# Xuhui-based AI company unveils groundbreaking products

Shanghai-based AI unicorn MiniMax recently hosted a highly anticipated tech launch week event, introducing five revolutionary products that push the boundaries of base models, multimodal technology, and intelligent agents. [...] The star attraction, MiniMax-M1, is the world's first open-source large-scale hybrid architecture inference model. It delivers top-tier performance in productivity scenarios, rivaling leading closed-source models while significantly reducing computational costs. [...] MiniMax also introduced the MiniMax Agent, a versatile intelligent agent capable of executing complex, multi-step tasks, and the Hailuo Video Agent, China's first "one-click" video production assistant. Additionally, Voice Design, an upgrade to the Speech 02 model, allows for highly customizable voice synthesis.

results.title: Navigating the AI revolution in customer service: a bibliometric ...
results.content:
This was followed by a second step that used a string of keywords based on a literature review. An initial search result with the keywords (“Artificial Intelligence” OR “AI”) AND (“Customer Service” OR “Customer Assistance” OR “Customer Support) in the Scopus database returned 3,755 document results (as retrieved on May 10, 2024). [...] Article that did not fit in the study range 2004–2024.
    Title, Abstract and Keywords did not contain the search term (“Artificial Intelligence” OR “AI”) AND --(“Customer Service” OR “Customer Assistance” OR “Customer Support).
    Language of the document published is other than English.
    The document type other than articles, conference papers and book chapters. [...] Generation Artificial Intelligence Development Plan”, which is a blueprint for setting aspirational goals for developing AI technology and applications (Araya and Marber, 2023). With the extensive applications of these technologies to enhance customer service and experience, the academic community in China has focused on technology and the application of AI customer service (Kasinathan et al., 2020).
